title: Christopher Gimmer – Semrush profileAuthor Photo
description: Semrush's digital marketing blog is an innovative resource for content strategy, content marketing, SEO, SEM, PPC, social media and more.
content: Facebook Ad Design: 6 Best Practices for Driving More ClicksWhen it comes to advertising on Facebook, it’s important to remember one thing — a Facebook ad is nothing without its image! Sure... headlines, copy and call to actions are all important. But when so much real estate is dedicated to the image itself, the image becomes a key component of your ad’s performance.Social MediaNov 04, 2015

headers.text: Facebook Ad Design: 6 Best Practices for Driving More Clicks
